Growth Fuel

Get the traction and momentum your business needs to grow and thrive.

Learn More

How Can We Help You?
By Capabilties By Industry By Department

FreshJones is a Digital Marketing Agency

  • Interactive
  • Marketing
  • Creative

FreshJones is a full service creative agency and digital marketing firm located in Western Massachusetts. We help people gain traction and build momentum in their business that fuels growth. We do this through listening, hearing and collaborating with you to strategically develop customer-focused, data-driven integrated marketing solutions that are uniquely suited to your specific needs.

Get to Know Us
Crafting beautifully functional solutions that grow businesses.

Offering strategy, design, and technology services to regional and national brands. We use a strategy-driven approach to create meaningful and relevant projects that help tell your story, engage with your audience and achive business results.

How will we fuel your growth?

  • 1

    Build Your Growth Strategy

    No two companies are alike, so we'll get to know you, your business and the challenges and problems you face. We'll listen to things you've tried so far, what's worked and what hasn't and where we can fit in and help. We'll put together a complete plan to meet your unique challenges and goals based on your specific business needs.

  • 2

    Ramp Up Your Digital Prescence

    Everything starts online. Customers are searching for and making decisions about your business based on information they find online. We'll make sure your digital footprint is accurate, on-brand, optimized and fully prepared be there and be helpful when customers and prospects go looking.

  • 3

    Attract and Drive Leads to Your Door

    A great website isn't much if no one knows about it. Here's where we'll put your growth strategy into practice, whether through lead-generating content on your website, call-only campaigns or whatever's necessary, we have the in-house capabilities to get your business moving towards your specific goals.

  • 4

    Monitor, Test and Improve

    You wouldn't expect a seed to grow without watching it and giving it what it needs to thrive. The same goes with your business. That's why we'll work together to look at what the data is telling us, we'll optimize, test, adjust and improve your marketing machine as it continues to building momentum.

Sound good? Learn more

Success Stories

We proud and humbled to be a small part of the success of these inspiring and motivating companies and the people that have given us the opportunity to work and grow along with them.

Success Stories
Chroma Technology Corp

For more than 25 years Chroma Technology Corp has provided scientific communities with the world's finest optical filter products. This employee-owned company has believed from their very begining in the power of a strong brand and has continued to grow and expand that brand in both new and existing markets despite an ever increasing competitive landscape.

  • Relationship
    • 2005–Present
  • Industries
    • Manufacturing
    • Science & Technology
  • Services
    • Web + Mobile
    • Marketing + Sales
    • Brand + Creative

"We've been working with FreshJones for over 10 years. We've grown from a small company in Vermont into a world-wide industry leader. Along the way we've been able to rely on FreshJones to help us visually communicate Chroma's vision, message and image to the scientific communities we serve. They adopt a deep understanding of our unique culture and challenges and they have the uncommon ability to conceptualize often difficult scientific concepts and translate them into easy-to-understand, eye-catching visuals."

—Chroma Technology Corp

Success Stories
Souix Falls YMCA

In 2014 Y-USA was rebranded to better reflect its core principles and contributions to society. After this rebranding, each of the nation's YMCA's were provided with brand guidelines to be put into practice within their organizations. We were able to help Souix Falls YMCA build a website that was—not only brand compliant—but also helped to increase their membership and their ability to help the communities they serve.

  • Relationship
    • 2016–Present
  • Industries
    • Non-Profit
  • Services
    • Web + Mobile

"We have enjoyed an amazing customer service experience working with FreshJones. Our website is attractive, brand compliant and very easy to administer. This ease of use allows our marketing department to focus on content development rather than worrying about website design. Best of all, our website traffic quadrupled in the first few months and we now serve more children in our community than ever before! "

—Souix Falls YMCA

Solutions By Industry

We have a broad range of experience creating advertising and marketing solutions for a variety of industries and markets.

Manufacturing

Have a manufacturing business? We've got experience helping companies like yours. Focusing on trustworthiness and authority, quality and reliability, performance, data-driven lead and prospect generation

Learn More

Higher Education

Focusing on increasing enrollment and retention, degrees and programs, fundraising initiatives, student, parent, faculty and alumni engagement, promoting and showcasing campus and college experience.

Learn More

Non-Profit

Focusing on user-experience, donation and fund-raising tools, strong donor and support relationships, increased memberships, greater awareness and community involvement in your cause.

Learn More

Financial Services

Specialized services such as offering memorandums, financial reporting, prospectuses, annual meeting presentations, investment portfolio profiles and more

Learn More

Retail & Distribution

Addressing concerns such as consumer-focus, Conversion-rate optimization, personalized buying experiences, checkout flow, cost of aquisition.

Learn More

 
Open YMCA Platform

The Open Y platform is a Drupal 8 CMS custom built for the specific requirements of YMCA's.

Build you YMCA's website with the open-y and instantly take advantage of the powerful and feature-rich opportunities the platform has to offer.

Solutions By Department

C-Suite Executive

Your focus is on company vision, customers needs, meeting revenue and growth targets, business alignment and strategy, profitability.

Learn More

Technology Manager

Your focus is overseeing the technocal aspects of your company, alignment with business goals, future growth, colaboration with other deparment needs, budgeting, efficiency, productivity, effectiveness.

Learn More

Marketing Manager

Your focus is on managing creative efforts, leading initiatives, coordinating outside agencies, determining budgets, establishing and meeting sales and marketing objectives, developing strategies.

Learn More

Small Business Owner

As an SMB owner your responisble for your companies growth, keeping a close eye on your numbers comparing them to your goals, ensuring your stabilty and guiding future direction while overseeing daily operations.

Learn More

In-house marketing team

Your in-house marketing team has many roles and responsibilities it needs to fill, such as brand management, budget management, creative output, advertising specialists, coversion optimised design, SEO, web development and more.

Learn More

Advertising agency

As a busy advertising agency it an be difficult to balance resources with demand, or make decision to employ specialized skill. We can help fill these voids by supporting your core team while keeping your staffing requirements in check.

Learn More

Why FreshJones?

We're Experienced

We've been working with growing companies since 2003 and have well over 25 years of experience with helping businesses meet their marketing and growth goals.

We love what we do

We're digital natives with a solid background in traditional marketing methods. Working with and helping people solve their business challenges and being part of their growth is what we live for.

We Care

First and foremost we're human. We're just people trying to solve other peoples problems using the skills and capabilities we've worked hard to build. We'll give you straight honest answers and work to exceed your expectations.

Interested in talking?

Let's schedule a call.

We love working with growing companies. Whether your just researching, have more questions or in a "help I need it now" situation we want to hear from you. Let’s begin with a discovery call to discuss your needs.
